original_text: You must continue to trust God. Always do what you know to be right. Some people have refused to do what is right, even when they know what they should do. As a result, they no longer believe God's true message.
korean_text: 믿음과 착한 양심을 가지라 어떤 이들은 이 양심을 버렸고 그 믿음에 관하여는 파선하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You must continue to trust God
Always do what you know to be right
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 옳다고 아는 것을 항상 행하라

sentences.original_text: Some people have refused to do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 옳은 일을 하기를 거절했다

sentences.original_text: even when they know what they should do
they no longer believe God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 하나님의 참된 메시지를 믿지 않는다
